resources.string:
Student:
 B.Tech CSE, 
 3rd Year
 Brainware University

Mousumi Majumder
 Senior Technical - 
 Consultant
 Webtek Labs

Register as a Medical Authority or as a Patient. 


As Medical Authority, you can post updates, advertise, or send health alerts on the News Feed for other users to see.

Mediacal Authorities can inter-link with each other through the Settings Option once they have logged in. Hospitals and Clinics have the permission to Accept/ Reject/ Modify Appointment requests.

Doctors can only view the Scheduled Appointments.


As Patient, one can request for an appointment as per his choice of location speciality, etc.

If Confirmed, Appointments will be visible under the Schedule Option


 Non-Medical Authorities are not allowed to post on the forum but they can view it anytime.





Note: Sharing Option is inactive for the moment.
